description_template: As a skilled mage, you contemplate the mystical egg before you. The arcane energies within resonate with your own magical essence. What magical approach would you like to take?

choice_templates.text: Channel magical energy into the egg
Practice magical attunement with the egg
Allow the egg to absorb ambient magical energy

description_template: Your magical senses detect something unusual about the egg's aura...

choice_templates.text: Use your arcane sight to examine the phenomenon
Let the magical energies settle naturally
